title: Silenced
short_cast: Gong Yoo, Jung Yu-mi, Kim Hyeon-soo, Jeong In-seo, Baek Seung-hwan, Jang Kwang, Kim Min-sang, Im Hyeon-seong, Kim Joo-ryoung

desc: Amid a multitude of cover-ups, a caring teacher attempts to publicly expose faculty members who are molesting students who are deaf.
